Package tradedatacorp.smelter.filesmelter

Interface FileSmelterStateful<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of a single data instance this smelter processes.
All Superinterfaces:
Smelter<T>, SmelterStateful<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
OHLCV_BinaryLexicalFileSmelter, OHLCV_BinaryLexicalSmallFileSmelter
public interface FileSmelterStateful<T> extends SmelterStateful<T>
The purpose of this interface is to behave as a file writing stream to save files.
